title: The Time Machine
summary: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...

toc.value: The Time Machine by H. G. Wells

structuredData.headline: The Time Machine
structuredData.description: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...

title: 时间机器
summary: 时间旅行者（为了方便起见，我们这样称呼他）正在向我们阐述一个深奥的问题。他灰白色的眼睛闪闪发光，通常苍白的脸色变得红润和生动……

toc.value: H. G. 威尔斯的《时间机器》
